href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore"><!---->https://chrome.google.com/webstore<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span> page. This functions are usually only accessible only through a Chrome extension.<span class="line"><!----> page. This functions are usually only accessible only through a Chrome extension.<!----></span><br><br>The bookmarklet abuses this and runs code to use the ``chrome.management`` functions to disable the extensions.<span class="line"><!---->The bookmarklet abuses this and runs code to use the ``chrome.management`` functions to disable the extensions.<!----></span><br><br>According to the docs (<span class="line"><!---->According to the docs (<!----></span>https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/reference/management/#method-uninstall<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/reference/management/#method-uninstall"><!---->https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/reference/management/#method-uninstall<!----></a>).<span class="line"><!---->).<!----></span><br><br>> Note: This function does not work in managed environments when the user is not allowed to uninstall the specified extension/app.<span class="line"><!---->&gt; Note: This function does not work in managed environments when the user is not allowed to uninstall the specified extension/app.<!----></span><br><br>But it does exactly that.<span class="line"><!---->But it does exactly that.<!----></span><br><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Externally reported security bugs may appear in Chrome release notes.            issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
